attributes.title: Just Horrible
attributes.review: I opened the app and a video of Tr*mp himself popped up calling me a stupid libtart and a f*gg*t. he must be data mining because he wasn’t wrong but i didn’t tell him that!!!!! then once i went to delete it he sent the SS to my house and swatted me!!! not worth the risk

attributes.title: awful, terrible, no good, very bad
attributes.review: this app gives me no real information, it runs like an insta influencers account does...why does the president of the US need an app? or merch? he should go back to where he came from!! tv!!! 🙄

attributes.title: Disappointment
attributes.review: I was very disappointed in this app. As soon as I opened it I knew that it wasn’t the app for me. I instantly saw a picture of a racist misogynistic pig instead of the president. I can’t believe that anyone would deface their President like this. Very sad!!!!

Water. Earth. Fire. Air.
Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony. Then everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked. 

Only the Avatar, master of all four elements , could stop them. But when the world needed him most, he vanished. 

A hundred years passed and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar, an airbender named Aang, and although his airbending skills are great, he still has a lot to learn before he's ready to save anyone.

But I believe Aang can save the world.

attributes.title: Crashed
attributes.review: I don’t like the fact Trump tries to copy people all the time. TikTok should stay and he should go. TikTok is the one of the places where I see people come together from different backgrounds to love and support one another. LEAVE TIKTOK ALONE!

attributes.title: My dog
attributes.review: This app will eat all your fringe and chips .My uncle got his fridge taken away and never saw it again .The app did it .My dog got the app and his been missing for 30 years .He never came back with Panda Express I was left hangry

attributes.title: NOT WORTH DOWNLOADING
attributes.review: This app is a complete LIE just like Trump himself. If I could give this app 0 stars then I would. Complete and utter trash, don’t even waste your time downloading this crap to your phone, everyone’s better off without it and without trump.

attributes.title: i —
attributes.review: why did i waste my storage.  Fake news 24/7.  Glitches are more common than actual reporting.  Truly trash and i hope this gets taken down for revision but i wouldn’t be opposed to permanent removal.

attributes.title: Horrible App!
attributes.review: This app doesn’t work well. It glitches all the time and has misinformation throughout it. I don’t recommend getting this app, it’ll just waste space on your phone.
